title: dalao们，看看报错
author: Smile_Sun
txt_content:

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
K锅连接不到更新服务器
Error occured during retriving version
retrieve英 [r?'tri?v]美 [r?'triv]
n. [计] 检索；恢复，取回
vt. [计] 检索；恢复；重新得到
vi. 找回猎物

这个插件屏蔽
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-699567-1-1.html

replies.author: 白羊羊
replies.txt_content: 把插件的自动更新关了试试看
